EzyRent Terms of Use

Welcome to EzyRent! These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our platform. By accessing or using EzyRent, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, please discontinue use immediately

Your Responsibilities

Account Registration

  • You must provide accurate and up-to-date information during sign-up.
  • Keep your account credentials secure and notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized access.

By using the platform, you agree NOT to:

  • Post misleading or illegal property information.
  • Use the platform for fraudulent purposes.
  • Upload malware, spam, or harmful content.

Compliance

  • You are responsible for complying with local rental laws and regulations in Nigeria.

Services Overview

Tenant Services

  • Browse verified property listings.
  • Book property inspections and submit rental applications.

Landlord Services

  • Post property listings (free and premium options available).
  • Access property verification services and analytics dashboards.

Property Managers

  • Provide property verification and tenancy management support based on subscription tiers.

Subscriptions and Payments

Plans

  • We offer flexible subscription plans for landlords and tenants. Check the pricing page for details.

Payment

  • All payments are processed securely via trusted gateways.
  • Subscriptions are non-refundable unless required by law.

Late Payment

  • Failure to renew subscriptions may result in service suspension.

Privacy Policy

  • Your personal information is handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using EzyRent, you consent to data collection and usage as described therein

If you have questions or concerns, you can contact us at

Email: support@ezrent.ng

Phone: +234 [8127-518-838].

Address: Akoka, Yaba, Lagos, Nigeria.
